name: Japan Playstation Network 3000yen card PSP/PS3
description:
Very reasonably priced legit Playstation Network 3000yen Card from JAPAN. Allows non japanese residents to buy japan exlcusive games, wallpapers, and more. The japanese PSN store has alot more games than the american and european stores. Code will be delievered to buyer's PAYPAL email address within 24 HOURS.
You can use this code on any PSP/PS3 console regardless of whether it is an American/Asian/European console.
